instructions.name: add_liquidity
docs: Add liquidity to AMM pool (constant product x*y=k)

docs: Add liquidity to settlement slot pool

docs: Buy back CADEN tokens with protocol fees (deflationary mechanism)

docs: Vote on a governance proposal

instructions.name: claim_fees
docs: Claim USDC fees from protocol revenue (real yield!)

docs: Crank instruction: Update heatmap with current spread data (callable by anyone)

instructions.name: create_proposal
docs: Create a governance proposal

docs: Create a new settlement slot AMM pool

instructions.name: execute_proposal
docs: Execute a passed proposal

instructions.name: finalize_proposal
docs: Finalize a proposal after voting period ends

instructions.name: init_amm_pool
docs: Initialize AMM pool for Long/Short CFD trading

instructions.name: init_governance
docs: Initialize CADEN governance system

instructions.name: init_heatmap
docs: Initialize spread heatmap (admin only)

instructions.name: init_market
docs: Initialize a new market for CFD trading

instructions.name: init_multi_asset_oracle
docs: Initialize Multi-Asset Oracle for cross-asset settlement slots

docs: Initialize oracle mock (admin only)

instructions.name: init_oracle_aggregator
docs: Initialize Oracle Aggregator with multiple price sources

instructions.name: init_token_mint
docs: Initialize CADEN-CFD token mint

instructions.name: instant_t0_settlement
docs: Execute Instant T+0 Settlement - Settle bet instantly using T+0 NFT

instructions.name: liquidate_position
docs: Liquidate an unhealthy position (maintenance threshold < 90%)

docs: Mint CFD token representing a position with leverage

instructions.name: mint_settlement_slot_nft
docs: Mint a Settlement Slot NFT - Creates a new asset class for settlement timing rights

docs: Place a simple bet on asset price direction

instructions.name: settle_market
docs: Settle market and transfer profits in USDC

instructions.name: stake_caden
docs: Stake CADEN tokens to receive stkCADEN (governance tokens)

instructions.name: swap_cfd_tokens
docs: Swap Long ↔ Short CFD tokens (constant product AMM with fees)

instructions.name: swap_usdc_for_slots
docs: Swap USDC for settlement slot NFTs

instructions.name: trade_settlement_slot
docs: Trade a Settlement Slot NFT - Enables trading of settlement timing rights

instructions.name: update_asset_price
docs: Update asset price in multi-asset oracle

instructions.name: update_oracle
docs: Update oracle price (admin only)

instructions.name: update_price_from_external
docs: Update price from external API (CoinGecko, Twelve Data, etc.)

docs: Update price from REAL Pyth oracle

docs: Update price from Switchboard oracle

errors.name: Unauthorized
errors.msg: You are not authorized to perform this action

errors.name: InvalidLeverage
errors.msg: Invalid leverage: must be between 1x and 3x

errors.name: PositionHealthy
errors.msg: Position is healthy and cannot be liquidated

errors.name: BetAmountTooSmall
errors.msg: Bet amount must be at least $10
